incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Safaricom Network in Kenya

incident_updates.body: SMS delivery delays to Safaricom network in Kenya were observed between 09:39 and 10:35 Pacific Time on 11/23/2024. Customers may have experienced delayed SMS delivery during the incident. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Issues When Adding Participants to Conference Calls in App Connect

incident_updates.body: The issue with Flex Voice conference has been resolved and it is operating normally at this time.

Flex Voice conference is now operating normally. Customers should be now able to add participants to conferences while using ApplicationId as “from” number. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with Voice conference, where Application Connect is configured for voice call flows: https://www.twilio.com/en-us/blog/introducing-twilio-application-connect-programmable-voice. Customers are unable to add participants to conferences while using ApplicationId as “from” number. We expect to provide another update in 15 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Twilio Console - Short Code Applications are not Being Submitted

incident_updates.body: the issue affecting the Submission of Short Code Applications has been resolved and the Short Code submission page in Twilio Console is operating normally at this time.

Our engineers have identified the issue affecting the Submission of Short Code Applications and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently seeing degraded performance on our account portal. Submission for review of new shortcode applications for United Kingdom and Canada are currently affected; addtionally, submissions to update any existing Short Code application for United States are affected as well. 

Our engineering team is looking into the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue affecting the Submission of Short Code Applications in the Twilio Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Twilio Flex and Task Router Degraded Performance

incident_updates.body: Twilio Flex, including Task Router, was degraded for 10 minutes between 11:19 AM and 11:29 AM Pacific Time on 11/18/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced issues related to initiating, routing, and wrapping up calls. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Multiple Destination Via A Subset Of Alphanumeric Sender ID And Longcode

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays to multiple destinations via a subset of alphanumeric sender ID's and longcodes. The incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe recovery in SMS delivery delays to multiple destinations via a subset of alphanumeric sender ID's and longcodes. We will continue to monitor the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update within 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
